config.circuitBreakerServiceSplunkQuery: index=app mmpcdiscountengine sourcetype=orangelog context="discount-engine" | stats count(evl(searchmatch("executeCircuitBreaker"))) as numTotalCalls, avg(executeCircuitBreaker_time), min(executeCircuitBreaker_time), p98(executeCircuitBreaker_time), count(eval(executeCircuitBreaker_time < 750)) AS slaCount, count(eval(searchmatch("processCloudCartRequest_time"))) as numCloudCalls, avg(processCloudCartRequest_time) as avgCloudCallTime, min(processCloudCartRequest_time) as minCloudCallTime, max(processCloudCartRequest_time) as maxCloudCallTime, count(eval(processCloudCartRequest_time <= 750)) AS slaCloudCount, count(eval(searchmatch("processStoreCartRequest_time"))) as numStoreCalls, avg(processStoreCartRequest_time) as avgStoreCallTime, min(processStoreCartRequest_time) as minStoreCallTime, max(processStoreCartRequest_time) as maxStoreCallTime, count(eval(processStoreCartRequest_time <= 750)) AS slaStoreCount, count(eval(searchmatch("promoId") AND searchmatch("v4_response_1"))) as numCloudCallsWithDiscount
